review: Not wildly enthusiastic.  Does what it says, but I purchased as a Kindle connection as well.  Does everything the Fire TV should do fine, but not so wild about the Kindle connection and display.The Kindle display "lags" because of the WiFi interface connection.  It has to go from the Kindle, to your WiFi, then to the Fire device.  If the WiFi is busy everything stutters.  Suggest one of the available Miracast connection devices if you want to connect to your Kindle.
author: Bill Kostic
